strategicInsights.title: Tier A: The $400k & Below 'Homesteaders'
strategicInsights.content: Focus on West Virginia (Berkeley/Morgan Counties) and Southern PA. Houses often require 'sweat equity'—1970s split-levels or farmhouses needing HVAC or roof overhauls. Best for 'Land Plays' with build-ready lots.
strategicInsights.action: Look for 'Unrestricted' land in WV for farming/livestock.

strategicInsights.title: Tier B: The $400k–$500k 'Move-In Ready'
strategicInsights.content: The 'Sweet Spot' for hybrid workers within a 90-minute commute. High competition. Habitable homes in Spotsylvania, VA or Martinsburg, WV.
strategicInsights.action: Critical: Check Fiber Optic availability to protect resale value.

strategicInsights.title: Future Outlook (2026–2027)
strategicInsights.content: Expect a 30-35% inventory spike through 2026 as sellers accept 6% rates. Modest price appreciation of 2-4% provides more breathing room for inspections.
strategicInsights.action: The 'Amazon Effect' from HQ2 will protect long-term value.

focusRegions.why: Flat land, VRE train to DC.
